title: Traditional Naturopathy - Natural Approach to Wellness
description: Mary Theresa Jurnack is a certified traditional naturopath, teaching clients to apply natural lifestyle changes to facilitate the body's own natural healing.
cleaned_text: | | "Naturopathy is a philosophy which encompasses a view of life, a model for living a full life. The word naturopathy is a Latin-Greek hybrid which can be defined as 'being close to or benefiting from nature.'" | | | | | | Copyright © 2023
